Html:
Hi  i like Rawr very much and play a Prot Warrior. My problem is the optimzer likes threat values  i dont like threat value because i do very much aggroand with revenge stacks isn threat   stats very much need.

 

So i ask is it possible to do a option do prefer a survival + mitigation optimization ?  at the moment only  survival or mitigation are possible.  Without threat ?

 

Sorry 4 my very bad english  :,(
Under the options tab there is a setting for threat wher you can reduce its value (to zero if you  like).   That should suit your purposes.
